Guillermo Zendejas

Freelance Web Developer

About Me

Hi there!

My name is Guillermo (or "Memo" for short), and I'm a freelance web developer in San Jose, CA, specializing in modern responsive websites and applications. I primarily work with the MERN stack (React, Node.js, Express, mongoDB), but dabble in several other technologies.

I also hold a bachelor's degree in finance from San Jose State University, and worked in commercial banking for several years.

Please feel free to contact me for a quote.
